songs.title: Black Madonna
songs.lyrics:
(Snippet)
Black diamonds, blue dollars and purple clouds for black Madonna That Calico shred ya fitted, I got it if you want it
Guess I’m poppin ya topper like Jiffy Pop, jelly ya donut
Lil’ mamas a rider, she get them dollars and get going
Put li'l mama in Prada/lacy Provocateur, he zonin'
